abstract: Hockey Roundup; Tampa Bay Lightning beat Detroit Red Wings, 3-2; Tampa Bay leads series, 3-1; other pro hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Ondrej Palat scored late in the third period to lift the Tampa Bay Lightning to a 3-2 win in Detroit.

headline.main: Lightning Edge Red Wings to Take a 3-1 Series Lead
headline.print_headline: Lightning Top Red Wings to Take a 3-1 Series Lead

snippet: Ondrej Palat scored late in the third period to lift the Tampa Bay Lightning to a 3-2 win in Detroit.
